Dgame.Window.VideoMode



struct VideoMode;
The VideoMode struct contains informations about the current window video mode. It is passed to Window which extract the informations and use them to build a window context.

Author:
rschuett

ushort width;
The width of this video mode

ushort height;
The height of this video mode

ubyte refreshRate;
The refresh rate of this video mode

this(uint width, uint height, uint hz = 0);
CTor

const bool isValid(ubyte display = 1);
Returns:
if the this video mode is valid which means, if it is listed from the OS

const pure nothrow bool opEquals(ref const VideoMode vm);
opEquals

static VideoMode getDesktopMode(ubyte display = 1);
Returns:
the desktop video mode

static VideoMode getMode(uint index, ubyte display = 1);
Returns:
the video mode on the given index

static VideoMode[] listModes(ubyte display = 1);
Returns:
A List of all valid supported video modes

static int countModes(ubyte display = 1);
Returns:
how much valid video modes are supported
